siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: The Idea Generator by AreYouInterested is a completely free tool to structure your idea generation. It guides you through the Niche-Action-Problem brainstorming system, and allows you to see the ideas that other members of the community came up with, too.
blogPost.body: The Idea Generator by AreYouInterested is a completely free tool to structure your idea generation. It guides you through the Niche-Action-Problem brainstorming system, and allows you to see the ideas that other members of the community came up with, too.
blogPost.title: The Idea Generator - A tool to help structure your business idea brainstorming
blogPost.author: James Skarzynski

localize.description: AreYouInterest的Idea Generator是一个完全免费的工具，用于构建您的创意生成。它引导您通过利基-行动-问题集思广益系统，并允许您看到其他社区成员提出的想法。
localize.tagline: 集思广益，帮助组织您的商业想法的工具

localize.description: AreYouInterest的Idea Generator是一個完全免費的工具，用於構建您的創意生成。它引導您通過利基-行動-問題集思廣益系統，並允許您看到其他社區成員提出的想法。
localize.tagline: 集思廣益，幫助組織您的商業想法的工具

previous.excerpt: Your Week is a simple weekly planner that I built to help me plan my priorities at the start of the week. It has a clear week-based layout and provides a helpful reminder to plan each week. Try it at https://yourweek.app or get the Android app.
previous.title: Your Week - Hold yourself accountable to weekly goals and priorities.

localize.description: 你的一周是一个简单的每周计划器，我创建它是为了帮助我在一周开始时计划我的优先事项。它有一个清晰的以周为基础的布局，并提供了一个有用的提醒，以每周计划。在https://yourweek.app上试试，或者获取安卓应用程序。
localize.tagline: 让自己对每周的目标和优先事项负责。

localize.description: 你的一週是一個簡單的每週計劃器，我創建它是爲了幫助我在一週開始時計劃我的優先事項。它有一個清晰的以周爲基礎的佈局，並提供了一個有用的提醒，以每週計劃。在https://yourweek.app上試試，或者獲取安卓應用程序。
localize.tagline: 讓自己對每週的目標和優先事項負責。

next.excerpt: My Wolfpack is a friendly app that microgroups people according to their interests. If you are not particularly looking for dating but don’t want to meet people in huge groups that forbids you to really get to know them, you are in the right place.
next.title: My Wolfpack - Meet new friends according to your interests in micro-groups

localize.description: My Wolfpack是一款友好的应用程序，可以根据人们的兴趣对他们进行微分组。如果你不是特别想要约会，但又不想结识一大群阻碍你真正了解他们的人，那你就来对地方了。
localize.tagline: 根据你在微群中的兴趣结识新朋友

localize.description: My Wolfpack是一款友好的應用程序，可以根據人們的興趣對他們進行微分組。如果你不是特別想要約會，但又不想結識一大羣阻礙你真正瞭解他們的人，那你就來對地方了。
localize.tagline: 根據你在微羣中的興趣結識新朋友
